title: Jerusalem artichoke and carrot fricassee
ingredients: ['450g (1 lb) carrots, thickly sliced', '450g (1 lb) Jerusalem artichokes, peeled and thickly sliced', '1 shallot, chopped', '15g (1/2 oz) butter', '15g (1/2 oz) plain flour', '300ml (1/2 pt) vegetable stock', '75g (3 oz) grated cheese', 'salt and black pepper, to taste']
